dct_title_s: Mexico & Guatemala; by H.S. Tanner; engraved by J. Knight.; Mexico and Guatemala
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. "Entered according to Act of Congress, in the year 1834 by H.S. Tanner, in the Clerks Office of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania." Prime meridian: Washington. Insets: Valley of Mexico -- Guatemala. In upper margin: Tanner's Universal Atlas. In lower right margin: 30. From Tanner's "A New Universal Atlas Containing Maps of the various Empires, Kingdoms, States and Republics Of The World" which was published in 1836. 1 map: col.; 28 x 35 cm.
dct_creator_sm: Tanner, Henry Schenck, 1786-1858. New universal atlas. Plate no. 30
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
